name: Husk

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in the Arena by 30%.

skills.name: Burning Iron
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Despair
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 35% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to enemy MAX HP.
Damage based on: [Enemy MAX HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Retaliate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases according to this Champion's current HP.
Damage based on: [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
